title: Dapper on Congo religion - authors perspective

content.question: Which of the following best describes the perspective of the author?

choices.label: As a Dutch missionary, he is proud of the successful conversion of West Central Africa to Christianity.
As a European Christian, he objects to the continuation of Indigenous religious traditions.
As an Indigenous religious leader, he rejects the spread of foreign cultural influences.
As an African geographer, he is pleased with the growing prosperity of West Central Africa.

content.answer: As a European Christian, he objects to the continuation of Indigenous religious traditions.

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
